David Letterman then asks her what she does in her free time and Betty White says, Oh, I like to do most anything. Play with animals, mostly. And vodka's kind of a hobby. So David Letterman reaches down from behind the desk and produces a bottle of Grey Goose, to which Betty White laughs heartily. They share some vodka, then she does a classic spit-take. Drew Brees returns today for his fifth Pro Bowl as a backup to NFC starter Michael Vick , and continuing to participate when invited remains important to him. It is, definitely, because it's a lot of fun and I think it's a great representation of the league and we want to show the fans a good time, Drew Brees said yesterday. Oprah Winfrey , Simon Cowell admitted he wanted to quit while he was still at the top of his game. I asked a successful guy, "What's the best advice you can give me?' He said,` Simon Cowell , know when to leave the fair'. I think that's good advice- one year, I actually found myself thinking,` I've run out of insults, I don't know how I'm going to tell people they suck'. "Something inside you just says,` You know what, it's time to go', Simon Cowell added. "Without any regrets. I can look back on the past 10 years and say it's been a blast. I've enjoyed myself. a radio talk show host, Mike Pence started a TV show in 1995. Although Mike Pence was inspired by Rush Limbaugh , he kept to his "no personal attacks" pledge.
